snippet: Sergei Filin, the artistic director of the Bolshoi Ballet who was nearly blinded in January in an acid attack, will return to Moscow this weekend.
abstract: Sergei Filin, the artistic director of the Bolshoi Ballet who was nearly blinded in January in an acid attack, will return to Moscow this weekend.

headline.main: Bolshoi Artistic Director to Return to Moscow Months After Acid Attack
headline.print_headline: Injured Artistic Director To Return to Bolshoi
